item.title: Knowledge Sharing
item.description: Knowledge Sharing # Daily # Github Hut23 Repo # Coffee Breaks # Slack # Weekly # Tech Chat # See here. Reading Groups # Approximately Monthly # REG Team Meetings # SA2C Events # RSE Newsletter # SA2C Mailing List # Less frequently or ad-hoc # Data study Groups # SA2C courses and training # Remote Co-working # Hack Sessions & RSE Collaborative Time # Repo Audits # Project retrospective # Working on Other Projects #

item.title: Meeting Records
item.description: Meeting Records # When a synchronous meeting is unavoidable, it is critical to produce a clear and thorough record. The meeting record is important as a reference for what happened at the meeting. In particular, any decisions made or actions assigned need to be clearly recorded for future reference. A good record will also be invaluable to anyone who was not able to attend an in person meeting. Meeting Record Template #
